data.partBlankContent: A top essay will have a clear and systematic structure. Ideally, at a__ one po___ your rea____ will kn__ where th__ are, and w__ they a__ there. data.fullContent: A top essay will have a clear and systematic structure. Ideally, at any one point your readers will know where they are, and why they are there. In practice this means that you'll be clear about what you want to write before you start, and then you organize your thoughts in a coherent manner. The different sections are thus linked in a way obvious both to you and your reader.
data.answer: 一篇好文章应该有一个清晰系统的结构。理想情况下，在任何一个点上，你的读者都知道他们在哪里，以及他们为什么在那里。在实践中，这意味着在你开始写之前，你会清楚你想写什么，然后你以连贯的方式组织你的想法。不同的部分以一种对你和你的读者都很明显的方式链接起来。
